numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I have observed younger women.
2. Younger women tend to contact a parent once daily or a few times weekly.
3. I have observed men.
4. Men tend to contact a parent less frequently than younger women.
5. Texting appears to be a preferred mode of communication.
6. Calling is a more personal method of communication than texting.
7. Meeting in person is a more personal method of communication than texting.
8. I ask whether they will start to reach out more.
9. I ask whether they will communicate more intimately.
10. Visiting in person is an intimate way of communication.
11. Calling is an intimate way of communication.
12. This topic is relevant to me.
13. This topic is relevant to my community.
14. People mature.
15. Each person has some form of parental guidance.
16. People develop into unique individuals.
17. The interactions between people and their parents can evolve.
18. I make sure that I stay in consistent communication with my family.
19. My parents are part of my family.
20. I stay in consistent communication with my parents.
21. The headline is: Connecting Generations: Navigating Communication with Parents.
